law.catch_line: A person may not start a vehicle that is stopped, standing, or parked until the movement can be made...

text.section: A person may not start a vehicle that is stopped, standing, or parked until the movement can be made with reasonable safety.
A person may not start a vehicle that is stopped, standing, or parked until, if any other vehicle might be affected by the movement, he gives an adequate signal to approaching traffic.
